name: The Last: a Playbook for Interstitial Our Hearts Intertwined
name_original: The Last: a Playbook for Interstitial Our Hearts Intertwined
description: The Last is a playbook for Interstitial: Our Hearts Intertwined. It's based off if the "last of their kind" trope shown by Aang from Avatar, Martian Manhunter from DC comics, and A.L.F. The Last has a very easy time forming Light links, making deep friendships wherever they go.
